name: Escape Plan (itch) (MuchosWaffles)
description:
Made for Dokkae in Secret Santa Jam 2021

Escape Plan is a horror/stealth game in which you gather items needed to escape while staying out of the enemies' sights. I had a lot of fun making it and I hope you enjoy :)

NOTE: The difficulty may be a problem, if so, I included a few "cheat codes", where F1, F2, and F3 will toggle difficulty while in the game.

           -F1 will set the difficulty to the default one, in which the enemies can outrun you if detected.

           -F2 will set the speed of the enemies to be roughly equal to that of the player, which means they shouldn't catch you as long as you keep running
           -F3 will set the speed of the enemies to be slightly less than that of the player, so you are able to outrun them.

Controls (also listed in game):

  • WASD and Mouse
  • E to interact
  • Ctrl to crouch (can be used to hide when detected)
  • F to toggle flashlight (although due to time restraints, it doesn't effect being seen)
  • Hold ESC to return to the menu
